channel.title: RCE on RotrixX's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in RCE on RotrixX's Blog

item.title: Intro to RCEs: What they are and how to prevent them
item.description: An RCE (Remote Code Execution) allows the attacker to execute malicious code on a remote server if, for example, you have a website with a vulnerable parameter in the url. Discover more about RCEs and how to prevent them in this article!
